summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Rural Waste Management System. Backend APIs fully functional with 22/22 tests passing. Frontend routing, signup flow, dashboard, and CRUD operations working correctly. Minor authentication flow issue identified.

integration_issues.issue: Login shows 'Invalid credentials' error when trying to login with account that may not have completed full signup flow

passed_tests: ML optimization run and route generation
Frontend home page load and navigation
Dashboard page load after complete signup

action_item_for_main_agent: Minor fix needed: Investigate login flow issue where existing credentials show 'Invalid credentials' error. May be related to incomplete signup flow or session management.
